entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
